meaning_str.bing:
n. 三月
网络. 进行曲；玛驰；行军

三月；马奇（人名）；（march）行进；行军；长途跋涉；示威；游行；进展；进步；步伐；进行曲；（一段时间进行的）路程
（march）行进；行军；（军队）进人；齐步前进；使行进；前进；使前进；进发；出来；通过；游行示威；使…去；强迫…去
（M.Arch.）建筑学硕士（Master of Architecture的缩写）

sogou-kaoyan.v/n: (march)行军; 进行曲[出现1次)];(march)游行示威[出现0次)]

sogou-CET6.v/n: (march)游行示威[出现3次)];(march)行军[出现0次)]

sogou-CET4.v/n: 游行示威[出现3次)];行军[出现0次)]

1.en: Maradona will be back in charge by the time the next formal international break comes round in March.
1.cn: 马拉多纳将于3月份下一轮正式国际比赛开始后重返赛场指挥球队。

2.en: As you begin March, a legendary conjunction between the Sun and Jupiter will still be strong during the first few days.
2.cn: 三月开始，太阳和木星结合带来传奇在最初的几天里依然很强烈。

3.en: Now, as he listened to the March wind, he thought, Okay, I may be crazy -but I think that wild dog in there would be a super cop.
3.cn: 此时，加拉赫一边倾听三月的风，一边想，好吧，我也许真是疯了，但我觉得那条野性十足的狗会成为一名超级警察。

0.en: For Genghis! For Genghis! For Genghis! March!
0.cn: 为成吉思汗而战！为成吉思汗而战！出发！

1.en: No, no, no. No, you need to March me inside and make me pay now.
1.cn: 不，不，不，你该押我进去，让我现在就付钱[付出代价] 。

2.en: There's no need for decrees. Or sermons to rouse. We march before they do. Go.
2.cn: 没必要下令，也没必要战前昭告，我们要先发制人，出发。

3.en: We have to do something! We can't let him march on the valley, take his revenge!
3.cn: 我们得马上行动，不能让太狼回到和谷村来报仇，荼害百姓。

4.en: And every other Saturday, he had to march in a parade and wave flowers at tyrants.
4.cn: 每两周的周六他都得参加游行，为一位暴君欢呼。

5.en: My brother, yes, we need not march, but at least marshal our forces. We must prepare.
5.cn: 兄弟，确实，我们还不用进兵，但至少应该整顿军队，我们必须做好准备。

6.en: I know what I said. I know what you said. I know what my mother said on March 5, 1992.
6.cn: 我知道我说了什么，我也知道你说了什么，我还知道我妈在1992年3月5日说了什么。

7.en: Right, so march in there, brush your teeth and go to bed. But I don't want to go to bed.
7.cn: 没错，所以进屋去，刷刷牙，上床睡觉。但我不想睡觉。

8.en: But the future, our future starts tomorrow at dawn. When we march together into the Capitol.
8.cn: 但未来我们的未来，将在明日黎明我们进入国会区之时峥嵘初现。

9.en: "Saturday, March 3rd. 0705, meeting called to order. 0706, president gets shampoo in eye. 0707, meeting adjourned."
9.cn: "周六，3月3号。7点5分，开会。7点6分，主席的眼睛里沾了洗发水。7点7分，散会。"。

10.en: I'd march into hell for you, if I thought there was a slightest chance of victory. But there isn't, this is suicide.
10.cn: 如果我觉得有半点机会的胜利，我会为你进军地狱，但目前还没有，这是自杀。

11.en: Hear me, Kublai. You have only half the men and horses you had on the last march. Kaidu has gone north. Banished north.
11.cn: 那你听我一句，忽必烈，比上次进攻，你现在仅剩半数的兵马，海都又回了北方。放弃南征吧。

12.en: I was born in March 1979, what does it make me? You're zodiac animal is the goat. Well, I eat a lot, so I like the goat.
12.cn: 我是在1979年3月出生，那我属什么？那你是属羊的。嗯，我吃过不少，所以，我喜欢羊。

13.en: As you lead your sons back into the jaws of Sidao's China, I will march north to Karakorum to defend the true Mongol capital.
13.cn: 您带着您的儿子们往贾似道的中原虎口走，我会向北进军回哈拉和林去保卫我们真正的蒙古都城。

14.en: Do you realize that teaching is the first thing I've failed at since my ill-fated attempt to complete a chin-up in March of 1989?
14.cn: 你知不知道，教书是我自从1989年3月做引体向上失败以后搞砸的第一件事。

15.en: I urged him to march upon Erebor, to rally the seven armies of the dwarves, to destroy the dragon and take back the Lonely Mountain.
15.cn: 我敦促他进军艾雷博，集合矮人的七支大军消灭恶龙，收复孤山。

16.en: Mom! Lily, you are not in charge of what you wear, of breakfast, or anything. Now, put that backpack on and march it out to the car!
16.cn: 老妈！莉莉，衣着，早餐，还有其他事，都不是你说了算，现在，背上背包，朝着我们的车进发。

17.en: We also have a deposition from a young woman, a staffer, who says Goodwin posed as a volunteer at an event in Cincinnati on March 8th.
17.cn: 我们还得到一份来自一名年轻女性的证词，是一名职员，她说古德温在3月8日辛辛那提的一场活动中假扮成志愿者。

18.en: But if you march back in there and you own it, you let those people know that you're better than them, and you will be a legend. Okay. Yeah. Okay?
18.cn: 但如果你昂首阔步回到派对上，不以为耻反以为荣，你让那些乌合之众明白你比他们强，你就会是传奇人物了。好。没错。好？

19.en: So here's what's gonna happen. Okay? You're gonna go to that party, and you're gonna march up to that network guy, and you're gonna tell him, "Manny out!"
19.cn: 所以接下来这样，好吗？你要去参加那派对，大步走向那电视台老总，然后大声说“奶爸不干了”。
